properties.shortDescription: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home close to Petts Wood station.
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.shortDescription: Exelent decorative order ,two bedrooms garden flat.
properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

properties.shortDescription: Four bedroom deattached house in a quiet residental cul-del-sac
properties.description: Spacious four bedroom detached house situated in a quiet residential cul-de-sac. The property features a large kitchen/diner, separate living room, study, en-suite to the master bedroom and a landscaped rear garden with garage and driveway parking.

properties.shortDescription: One bedroomed flat located within walking distance of Canary Wharf.
properties.description: Bright and compact one bedroom flat located within walking distance of Canary Wharf. The property benefits from floor-to-ceiling windows, modern fitted kitchen, secure entry system and excellent transport links via Jubilee Line and DLR.

Impressive five bedroom period property offering generous living accommodation arranged over three floors. Features include original fireplaces, high ceilings, modern kitchen extension, private garden and excellent access to local schools and transport links.

properties.shortDescription: Three bedrooms penthouse apartment located near to shops and mainline stations
properties.description: Stylish three bedroom penthouse apartment offering panoramic city views. The property features an open-plan living space, modern kitchen, two bathrooms, private terrace and secure underground parking. Located close to shops and mainline stations.

properties.shortDescription: Two bedrooms modern apartment located close to Bromely South Station
properties.description: Well-presented two bedroom modern apartment located in a popular residential development close to Bromley South station. The property offers open-plan living accommodation with a fitted kitchen, balcony access, two double bedrooms and a contemporary bathroom. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors.
